name: Elsy's Chickpea Burger
author: Jerryfish
summary: Amazing taste and quick to make. I serve these on an open toasted wholemeal bun with guacamole on top.
ingredients: ½ cup roughly chopped cilantro leaves and stems
½ cup vegetable oil, or as needed
directions: Place the chickpeas into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water; let stand 8 hours to overnight
Drain water from beans and transfer beans to a pot; cover with water
Bring water to a boil; reduce heat and simmer until beans are tender, about 1 hour
Combine chickpeas, cilantro, eggs, garlic, chickpea flour, tahini, coriander, salt, cumin, and chili powder in a blender; blend until well mixed but still chunky
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat; fry patties until golden and crisp, about 3 minutes per side
